ai-thig15.1:32.3_0: “I’ve done bad things in the past;

ai-thig15.1:33.2_0: “May you attain awakening, the highest state,

ai-thig15.1:34.2_0: and my whole group of relatives;
ai-thig15.1:34.3_0: and then, seven days after going forth,
ai-thig15.1:35.1_0: I know my last seven lives;

ai-thig15.1:35.3_0: of which this life is the fruit and result:
ai-thig15.1:35.4_0: focus your whole mind on that.

ai-thig15.1:36.4_0: I had sex with someone else’s wife.

ai-thig15.1:44.2_0: and was reborn as a girl in a carter’s family.
ai-thig15.1:44.3_0: We were poor, of little wealth,

ai-thig15.1:50.1_0: The Book of the Forties is finished.
